This is our EPPS6302: Methods of Data Collection and Production our final project project completed by Jaelon Braxton, Jhanvi Kannan, and I. This project aimed to look how DFW residents area adapting to hot weather induced by climate change. To conduct our research we used medical and climate data, as well as survey and interview data.
